8.14.name: Ghost Poro
8.14.DELIBERATE HAUNTING: After 1 second in brush, your current trinket becomes a ghost poro item, which may be used to place ghost poro
8.14.SPOOKY SPOOKY: While either you or your ghost poro is anywhere in enemy territory (past the river), gain 5-20 (based on level) ability power or 3-12 bonus attack damage, adaptive

8.14.name: Zombie Ward
8.14.WARD'S REVENGE: Damaging a champion after destroying a ward inflicts 30-90 (at levels 1-18) bonus magic damage
8.14.FRIENDLY BURIAL: Zombie Wards now only spawn from enemy wards killed, not also friendly wards which time out

8.16.name: Electrocute
8.16.DAMAGE RATIO (AD): 0.5 bonus attack damage => 0.4 bonus attack damage

8.16.name: Celerity
8.16.ATTACK DAMAGE: 9.6% bonus movement speed => 6% bonus movement speed
8.16.ABILITY POWER: 16% bonus movement speed => 10% bonus movement speed

8.11.name: Fleet Footwork
8.11.[REMOVED]CRIT HEAL: No longer gives additional healing from critical strikes

8.11.name: Hail of Blades
8.11.HAIL OF BLADES: Gain 50-100% (at levels 1-18) attack speed for the first three attacks made against enemy champions
8.11.NOW NOT LATER: If more than 1.5 seconds elapses between attacks this effect will end
8.11.CANT STOP WONT STOP: Hail of Blades allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit

8.11.name: Ultimate Hunter
8.11.ULTIMATE HUNTER: Your ultimate gains 5% reduced cooldown, plus an additional 2% per Bounty Hunter stack
8.11.BOUNTY HUNTER: Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion

8.11.name: Nimbus Cloak
8.11.NIMBUS CLOAK: Shortly after casting your Ultimate, gain 100 movement speed, decaying over the next 2.5 seconds
8.11.LIKE THE WIND: For the duration of the movement speed increase, you can pass through units
8.11.COOLDOWN REDUCTION: Unlike other runes, Nimbus Cloak's cooldown is affected by cooldown reduction

8.13.name: Domination Style Bonus
8.13.WITH RESOLVE: 9 ability power/5.5 attack damage => 10 ability power/6 attack damage
8.13.WITH PRECISION: 13 ability power/7.8 attack damage => 14 ability power/8.4 attack damage
8.13.WITH INSPIRATION: 18 ability power/10.8 attack damage => 20 ability power/12 attack damage
8.13.WITH SORCERY: 18 ability power/10.8 attack damage => 20 ability power/12 attack damage

8.12.name: Celerity
8.12.DAMAGE CONVERSION: Gain 4.8% (AD) or 8% (AP) => 9.6% (AD) or 16% (AP) of your bonus movement speed as bonus stats

8.12.name: Presence of Mind
8.12.BUGFIX: Many champions whose ultimate abilities use pet controls or multiple activations (ex. Talon recalling his R - Shadow Assault or Riven casting R2 - Wind Slash) now properly gain Presence of Mind's cooldown reduction on takedowns that occur while their ults are still active

8.1.name: Predator
8.1.newHUNT THE WEAK: If Predator's bonus damage is proc'd via an area-of-effect ability, it will now prioritize the lowest-health target hit
8.1.newADRENALINE: newADRENALINE Predator's rate of movement speed increase is increased by 50% for the first second and a half of the effect. This is unlisted in the tooltip because if you're making decisions around it, you're probably overthinking things.
8.1.newPARTIAL REFUND: newPARTIAL REFUND If Predator's channel is interrupted, 50% of the cooldown is now refunded

8.1.name: Resolve primary
8.1.RESOLVE + DOMINATION: RESOLVE + DOMINATION 130 health => 65 health plus 9 ability power or 5.4 attack damage, adaptive
8.1.RESOLVE + SORCERY: 130 health => 65 health plus 10 ability power or 6 attack damage, adaptive

8.1.name: Resolve secondary
8.1.DOMINATION + RESOLVE: 18 ability power or 10.8 attack damage, adaptive => 65 health plus 9 ability power or 5.4 attack damage, adaptive
8.1.PRECISION + RESOLVE: 18% attack speed => 65 health plus 9% attack speed
8.1.SORCERY + RESOLVE: 20 ability power or 12 attack damage, adaptive => 65 health plus 10 ability power or 6 attack damage, adaptive

8.3.name: Hextech Flashtraption
8.3.UNCHANGED: UNCHANGED Just for clarity on which runes are in which tier now

8.3.name: Magical Footwear
8.3.removedFIVE TOE DISCOUNT: removedFIVE TOE DISCOUNT No longer grants a 50 gold reduction in cost to upgraded boots

8.3.name: Perfect Timing
8.3.Contribution towards upgraded items: Contribution towards upgraded items 300 gold => 250 gold

8.3.name: Future's Market
8.3.unchanged: Just for clarity on which runes are in which tier now

8.3.name: Minion Dematerializer
8.3.unchanged: Just for clarity on which runes are in which tier now

8.2.name: Kleptomancy
8.2.updatedLESS LOOT: Drop rate significantly decreased in the first 15 minutes of the game
8.2.updatedLESS LESS LOOT: After 15 minutes, drop rate slightly decreased for melee, significantly decreased for ranged

8.2.name: Zombie Ward
8.2.newZOMBIE BY PROXY: newZOMBIE BY PROXY When a Zombie Ward user reveals a ward via sweeper, control ward, or scrying bloom, they no longer have to actually hit the ward to spawn a Zombie Ward (if the ward then dies).

8.5.name: Fleet Footwork
8.5.BUGFIX: Fleet Footwork's total healing listed in the Runes panel now only increases when it actually heals you

8.4.name: Precision
8.4.newSHARE: Speccing Precision alongside Sorcery or Domination grants you some stats from your primary tree and some from your secondary tree
8.4.PRECISION-DOMINATION: 18% attack speed => 9% attack speed, 9 ability power or 5 attack damage
8.4.DOMINATION-PRECISION: 18 ability power or 10.8 attack damage => 5.5% attack speed, 13 ability power or 7.8 attack damage
8.4.SORCERY-PRECISION: 20 ability power or 12 attack damage => 5.5% attack speed, 14 ability power or 8.4 attack damage
8.4.PRECISION-SORCERY: 18% attack speed => 9% attack speed, 10 ability power or 6 attack damage

8.4.name: Unflinching
8.4.updatedREORDERING: Unflinching has been moved to the Vitality row

8.4.name: Bone Plating
8.4.TOO TANKY: After taking damage from an enemy champion, their next three spells or attacks against you deal 20-50 less damage (at levels 1-18)

8.4.name: Second Wind
8.4.updatedREORDERING: Second Wind has been moved to the Resistance Row

8.4.name: Inspiration
8.4.removedLUSH: The Inspiration Tree no longer grants increased potion duration

8.4.name: Perfect Timing
8.4.WIND UP: Commencing Stopwatch transforms into Stopwatch at 6 minutes => 10 minutes

8.4.name: Time Warp Tonic
8.4.POWERTHIRST: While under the effect of potions, elixirs, or biscuits, gain 5% increased movement speed
8.4.THIRSTY: Your potions, elixirs, and biscuits last 20% longer

8.7.name: Manaflow Band
8.7.PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT: Hitting enemy champions with a spell grants 25 maximum mana, up to 250 mana
8.7.MASTER: Upon earning 250 mana, Manaflow Band restores 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds

8.7.name: Presence of Mind
8.7.THE ULTIMATE MANA REFUND: Enemy champion takedowns restore 20% of your maximum mana and refund 10% of your ultimate's cooldown

8.7.name: Cut Down
8.7.DAMAGE MULTIPLIER: 4-10% (at 150-2000 max health difference) => 4-12% (at 150-2000 max health difference)

8.7.name: Zombie Ward
8.7.ZOMBIE WARD DURATION: 60-180 seconds (at levels 1-18) => 30 seconds at levels 1-4; 36-120 seconds at levels 5-18

8.7.name: Absolute Focus
8.7.BUGFIX: Now lists how much it gives in the description at level 1.

8.6.name: Conqueror
8.6.MELEE ONLY: Damaging enemy champions refreshes this buff
8.6.CONQUERER: After 4 seconds in combat, your first attack against an enemy champion grants you 10-35 attack damage, based on level, for 3 seconds, and converts 20% of your damage to champions to true damage

8.6.name: Chrysalis
8.6.CHRYSALIS: Start the game with an additional 60 health. When you get 4 takedowns, consume that health to gain an adaptive bonus of 9 attack damage or 15 ability power.

8.9.name: updatedUnsealed Spellbook
8.9.STILL TICKING: Your original summoner spells continue cooling down in the background while swapped out
8.9.STORE COMES TO YOU: You can now swap your summoner spells anywhere on the map as long as you're out of combat
8.9.SWAP COOLDOWN: 4 minutes, permanently reduced by 15 seconds each time you swap to a summoner spell you haven't yet swapped to
8.9.newTAKE THIS!: Swap one of your equipped summoner spells to a new, single-use summoner spell. After using the single-use summoner spell, your original summoner spell will swap back in.
8.9.BUGFIX 3.9: Closing the Unsealed Spellbook tab while dead no longer prevents you from re-opening it until respawn

8.9.name: Chrysalis
8.9.BUGFIX 2.10: Chrysalis's tooltip now indicates the proper amount of adaptive stats granted once transformed
8.9.BUGFIX 3.1: Chrysalis's adaptive damage bonuses no longer revert to health when in combat with enemy champions

7.24b.name: Sorcery
7.24b.INSPIRATION + SORCERY: 16 attack damage or 27 ability power, adaptive => 13 attack damage or 22 ability power, adaptive
7.24b.SORCERY + ANY SECONDARY: 15 attack damage or 25 ability power, adaptive => 12 attack damage or 20 ability power, adaptive

7.24.name: Press the Attack
7.24.updatedPRESS THREE ATTACKS: Exposure is now added to targets after the damage from the attack that applies it

7.24.name: Fleet Footwork
7.24.ATTACK DAMAGE HEAL RATIO: 10% bonus attack damage => 30% bonus attack damage
7.24.newCRITICAL LEVELS: If the attack that activates Fleet Footwork is a critical hit, Fleet Footwork's healing is increased by 40% of your critical damage modifier

7.24.name: Phase Rush
7.24.SLOW RESISTANCE: Now also granted to ranged champions

7.24.name: Revitalize
7.24.newSAY THANK YOU: Now also boosts shields and heals cast on the user

7.24.name: Overgrowth
7.24.newMARKS ON THE WALL: "+HP" text now appears above minions when you gain health from attacking them

7.24.name: Kleptomancy
7.24.updatedSO MANY ITEMS: Loot table mechanism updated to decrease variance in loot over time.
7.24.removedYOU'RE TOO FAR AWAY: No longer increases attack range by 25

7.23.name: Summon Aery
7.23.BUGFIX: Aery now deals the correct adaptive damage type based on your stats

7.23.name: Zombie Ward
7.23.GRAVEROBBER: Killing a Zombie Ward now grants one gold

8.22.name: Time Warp Tonic
8.22.removedBOTTLE SERVICE: Time Warp Tonic no longer affects elixirs
8.22.removedSIPPING: Potions, biscuits, and elixirs no longer last 20% longer
8.22.SUGAR RUSH: You still gain 5% movement speed while under the effect of a potion or biscuit
8.22.newCHUGGING: Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 50% of its health and/or mana restoration immediately but prevents that consumable from being used again until the effect ends. Health/mana per tick is then reduced by half for the effect's regular duration.
